Package index

All functions

banc.surf banc_neuropil.surf banc_brain_neuropil.surf banc_vnc_neuropil.surf banc_neck_connective.surf banc_neuropils.surf banc_al.surf
Simplified tissue and neuropil surfaces for BANC
banc_all_synapses()
Download all of the BANC synapses as a .sqlite file that you can read lazily from later
banc_cave_client()
Low level access to banc's CAVE annotation infrastructure
banc_cave_query()
Query banc tables in the CAVE annotation system
banc_cave_tables() banc_nuclei() banc_cell_info() banc_cell_ids() banc_neck_connective_neurons() banc_peripheral_nerves() banc_backbone_proofread()
Read BANC CAVE-tables, good sources of metadata
banc_cellid_from_segid() banc_segid_from_cellid()
Convert between BANC cell ids and root ids
banc_change_log()
Fetch change log information for one or more neurons
banc_decapitate()
Subset points to be in the brain or in the VNC
banc_ids()
Return a vector of banc root ids from diverse inputs
banc_islatest()
Check if a banc root id is up to date
banc_latestid()
Find the latest id for a banc root id
banc_leaves()
Find the supervoxel identifiers of a banc neuron
banc_mirror()
Mirror BANC Connectome Points
banc_mirror_tpsreg
Thin-Plate Spline Registration for Mirroring in BANC Space
banc_neuron_comparison_plot()
Compare two neurons from the BANC connectome dataset
banc_partner_summary() banc_partners()
Summarise the connectivity of banc neurons
banc_read_l2dp() banc_read_l2skel()
Read L2 skeleton or dotprops for BANC neurons using fafbseg-py
banc_read_neuroglancer_mesh()
Read BANC euroglancer meshes, e.g., ROI meshes
banc_read_neuron_meshes() banc_read_nuclei_mesh()
Read one or more BANC neuron and nuclei meshes
banc_rootid()
Find the root identifier of a banc neuron
banc_scene()
Return a sample Neuroglancer scene URL for banc dataset
banc_set_token()
Set the token to be used to authenticate to banc autosegmentation resources
banc_to_JRC2018F()
Transform Points between BANC Connectome and JRC2018F Template Brain
banc_to_jrc2018f_tpsreg jrc2018f_to_banc_tpsreg
Thin-Plate Spline Registration from BANC to JRC2018F template brain
banc_view() banc_side_view() banc_front_view() banc_vnc_view()
Set Default View for BANC EM Dataset
banc_voxdims() banc_nm2raw() banc_raw2nm()
Handle raw and nm calibrated banc coordinates
banc_xyz2id()
Convert xyz locations to root or supervoxel ids
choose_banc() with_banc()
Choose or (temporarily) use the banc autosegmentation
dr_banc()
Print information about your banc setup including tokens and python modules
elastix_xform()
Perform Elastix Transform on 3D Points
geom_neuron()
Create ggplot2 Geom Layer for Neuron Visualization
ggneuron()
Create a ggplot2 Visualisation of Neuron Objects
ggplot2_neuron_path()
Convert Neuron Objects to ggplot2-Compatible Data
navis_elastix_xform()
Apply Elastix Transform using Navis
